summary: This mod gives you the animated Soul Edge Sword, known from the Soul Calibur games.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Dovahkiins :D

Whatâ€™s inside:
This mod gives you the Soul Edge Sword known from the Soul Calibur games.  You can find it in the Whiteruns Hall of the Dead Catacombs.  Both swords can be tempered, the Soul Edge greatsword is pre-enchanted with 25 Armor damage for 10 seconds and Absorb Health by 10 points. The one handed version can be enchanted and smithed after you obtain the Soul Edge greatsword and hold it in your inventory.

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

Modeler\'s note:
I created this model because I was browsing the mods, and have happened upon a soul edge-wannabe texture for one of the daedric swords. That re-texture has prompted a few people wishing for the real sword and one comment featured a link to a picture of Soul Edge from an Oblivion mod. so.. I went to work. I would like to thank SpaceWiking for making my relatively unknown work a skyrim reality.
Ver\'atai

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

Re-textures:
Here is a cool re-texture from Nexus79:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25174

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

Videos:
[youtube]cKO1SleYWPg[/youtube]                                                                         
Thanks to Brodual for this video :-) (SoulEdge starts at 5:19)

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

Installing:
Use the Nexus Mod Manager or extract the files to your Skyrim/Data folder and select it in the Skyrim launcher.

Uninstalling:
You can uninstall it like any other mod, via the nexus mod manager or by deleting the two mod related files.

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

Version 1.0
-adds the smithable Soul Edge Sword
-adds the unique Soul Edge Greatsword

Version 2.0
-enhanced textures
-the greatsword version has now the maximum possible size (bigger would cause to clip through the floor)

Version 2.1
-fix for the blood edge & hit effect

Version 2.2
-little damage boost
-fix for a better perk support

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

Credits:
Ver\'atai (3D model and Ideas)
Eye animation, textures and game implementation is my work :D

-----------------------------------
-----------------------------------

If you like my mods download, endorse, vote...

Wish much fun and greetings from Slovakia and Serbia :D
Tom (Space Wiking)
author: SpaceWiking and Veratai
